intro.description:
Welcome in this Quick Start Tutorial.
You will learn how to create an experiment based on an ADWin Gold hardware configuration. Then you will add a Subject to this experiment. This Subject will contain one session with ten trials.

item.title: Create an experiment
item.description:
Select menu item File > New > Experiment
Enter " NewExperiment " as experiment name and an optional description of this experiment. You could type " Quick start tutorial experiment " for instance.

item.title: Select created experiment
item.description: In the Experiments View, select this new created experiment. If the Experiments View is not visible, then select menu item Window > Show > Experiments View and select the new created experiment in this view.

item.title: Add an hardware configuration
item.description:
Select menu item File > New > DAQ Configuration
Enter " ADWinGold " as DAQ configuration name, " ADWinGold hardware configuration " as optional description and select ADWin as configuration, then click Finish

item.title: Add a subject with a session of ten trials
item.description:
In the Experiments View, select the created experiment then select menu item File > New > Subject
Enter " John_DOE " as subject name and an optional description, then click Finish
Select " John_DOE " Subject in the experiment view, then select menu item File > New > Session
Enter " Session1 " as session name, an optional description and ten as trials number, then click Finish
